title: Tasty chicken pie
ingredients: ['vegetable oil', '2 small leeks, sliced', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 handful chestnut mushrooms', '400 to 600g roast chicken (picked from a leftover roast chicken)', '100ml white wine', '50ml chicken stock', '150ml soya milk, mixed with a small amount of flour, or double cream', '1 sprig tarragon', '1 egg for egg wash if desired']
